statements: SELECT * FROM financial_access_control;
SELECT user_id, role FROM financial_access_control WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT permission, user_id FROM financial_access_control WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM financial_access_control WHERE permission LIKE '%read%';
SELECT role, permission, user_id FROM financial_access_control ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT user_id, role, permission FROM financial_access_control ORDER BY user_id DESC, role ASC
SELECT permission, role, user_id FROM financial_access_control WHERE role = 'admin' OR role = 'manager'
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, role FROM financial_access_control WHERE permission = 'read'
SELECT user_id, role, permission FROM financial_access_control WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND role = 'admin'
SELECT user_id, permission, role FROM financial_access_control WHERE role LIKE '%ger' ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT * FROM roles
SELECT role_name, role_id FROM roles ORDER BY role_name ASC
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role_id = 1
SELECT username FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT * FROM roles JOIN users ON roles.role_id = users.role_id
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, role_name FROM users JOIN roles ON users.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE password = 'secret123';
SELECT role_name, COUNT(*) FROM roles JOIN users ON roles.role_id = users.role_id GROUP BY role_name;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name LIKE '%admin%' ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username, role FROM users WHERE role='admin';
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE id=1;
SELECT id, username, role FROM users ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_roles INNER JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id WHERE roles.role_name='Admin';
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id WHERE u.role = 'admin' ORDER BY u.username ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT u.username, u.password, r.role_name FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id WHERE u.id > 100 OR r.role_name = 'manager' ORDER BY u.id DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT u.username AS 'User Name', r.role_name AS 'Role Name' FROM users u INNER JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id WHERE u.username LIKE 'j%' OR r.role_name = 'user' ORDER BY u.username DESC, r.role_name ASC LIMIT 20;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id WHERE u.password <> '123456' AND r.role_name IN ('admin', 'user') ORDER BY r.role_name DESC, u.username ASC LIMIT 15;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id WHERE u.username IS NOT NULL AND r.role_name NOT LIKE '%guest%' ORDER BY u.username ASC, r.role_name DESC LIMIT 25;
SELECT * FROM Roles;
SELECT role_name, role_id FROM Roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT username, password FROM Users WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM Accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, account_id FROM Transactions ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Roles;
SELECT user_id, username, role_id FROM Users ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM Accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT u.username, a.account_name, t.amount FROM Users u INNER JOIN Accounts a ON u.user_id = a.user_id INNER JOIN Transactions t ON a.account_id = t.account_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE income > 5000;
SELECT user_id, accessed_table, accessed_date FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY accessed_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE id = 2;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, accessed_table, accessed_date FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 4;
